name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quality Clouds Live Check for Salesforce

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Code with quality by adding Live Check functionality to your Salesforce Developer Console. For every file you work on in Chrome, you can check for (in real-time) and apply coding best practices from Quality Clouds. 

You can check a wide range of elements including: Classes, Triggers, Pages, Components, Objects, Reports.

For existing Quality Clouds users: 

If you have your org connected to Quality Clouds engine, you can check your code against three levels of controls: Salesforce best practices, industry standards, and Quality Clouds own recommendations. See more about our rules. 

https://docs.qualityclouds.com/display/QCD/All+rules

You can also keep your org technical debt in check, if you have set up a Quality Gate. Your reported issues are then split into your baseline and new issues.  

 

Not a Quality Clouds user yet? Try it free!

You can still use the extension to check your Salesforce code against our full list of best practices. Simply add it to your Chrome, and check out the instructions on getting the free API token.  

https://docs.qualityclouds.com/display/QCD/Quality+Clouds+Live+Check+for+Salesforce+-+Chrome+extension#QualityCloudsLiveCheckforSalesforceChromeextension-GetafreeAPItoken

See more information on our doc site, 

https://docs.qualityclouds.com/display/QCD/Quality+Clouds+Live+Check+for+Salesforce+-+Chrome+extension

and check out our Terms and Conditions. 

https://docs.qualityclouds.com/display/QCD/Terms+and+Conditions
